Title: Segway Ninebot Max, only 8 months old
text: This is a nearly new Segway Ninebot Max (I bought it 8 months ago).   Excellent condition, adult used and cared for.  These are amazing machines.   This model has received the best reviews many times.  I got it through Amazon where you can see what I paid and look at the reviews.  Rated at 18.6 miles per hour with a 40-mile range on a single charge (absolute ideal conditions, I have put over 26 miles without running out of juice).  Very well constructed with a solid metal, welded frame.  Expected service life is 4-5 years (with proper care).  It’s great for short commutes, especially passing the gas station these days!  Comes with the box, charging cord, bike lock (purchased separately), and a Ninebot Max front bag (purchased separately, not pictured).  You get all of that and a well-cared for and not ridden very much exceptional scooter.  Come to Maumelle and check it out.  I am free just about any time you’d like to come see it.
